description: Stylish and fully rejuvenated 3-bedroom townhouse in the heart of Lower Lonsdale. This 1,440 sq ft home spans three levels and showcases a meticulous renovation with high-quality materials and attention to detail throughout. The main level features bright, open living spaces that flow seamlessly to a modern kitchen and dining area, perfect for entertaining. Upstairs, enjoy comfortable bedrooms and beautifully updated bathrooms. With a private garage and an unbeatable location just steps from Lonsdale Quay, the Shipyards, shops, and dining, this home offers the best of North Shore living plus air conditioning throughout, move-in ready and effortlessly chic.
